## JsonRpcProvider.searchMsg() method

searches for a message in the chain and returns its receipt and the tipset where it was executed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
searchMsg(cid: Cid): Promise<MsgLookup>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cid | Cid |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
